name: This is life
description:
Are you going through a crisis in your life and looking for a way to feel better? Then this game is for you! By using your mouse, you can hit and destroy the problems in your life to move on to the next level and achieve happiness forever. At each level, the enemies represent the obstacles that each person can encounter in their life. The problems may be different for each person, but they all have one thing in common: they can be overcome. This game gives you the opportunity to free yourself from your worries and feel lighter. So, grab your mouse and attack your life problems, you will be surprised at how strong and capable you can be to overcome any difficulty.

Designer: Rotem Haim, Zohar Bernoviz

Developers :Ruben Hoba, Moshe Marciano, Michael Wolhandler
